pitch.1.title: description
pitch.1.text: Delicious chocolate cupcake with chocolate icing topped with white candy hearts. Perfect for chocolate lovers!

pitch.1.title: ingredients
pitch.1.text: wheat flour, sugar, alkalised cocoa powder, baking powder (raising agents (E 450 (diphosphates), E 500 (sodium carbonates)), starch), eggs, butter (milk, salt), salt, milk, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, sprinkles (sugar, rice flour, coconut oil, water, shea fat, fruit and vegetable concentrates [radish, apple, lemon, blackcurrant], thickener (sodium carboxymethylcellulose), flavouring)

pitch.2.title: description
pitch.2.text: Sweet vanilla cupcake with vanilla icing topped with chocolate chips, pink sprinkles, and chocolate bars. A classic!

pitch.2.title: ingredients
pitch.2.text: wheat flour, sugar, vanilla bean, baking powder (raising agents (E 450 (diphosphates), E 500 (sodium carbonates)), starch), eggs, butter (milk, salt), salt, milk, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, sprinkles (sugar, rice flour, coconut oil, water, shea fat, fruit and vegetable concentrates [radish, apple, lemon, blackcurrant], thickener (sodium carboxymethylcellulose), flavouring)

pitch.3.title: description
pitch.3.text: Raspberry-flavoured cupcake with vanilla icing topped with white candy hearts. A fruity delight!

pitch.3.title: ingredients
pitch.3.text: wheat flour, sugar, vanilla bean, raspberries, baking powder (raising agents (E 450 (diphosphates), E 500 (sodium carbonates)), starch), eggs, butter (milk, salt), salt, milk, sprinkles (sugar, rice flour, coconut oil, water, shea fat, fruit and vegetable concentrates [radish, apple, lemon, blackcurrant], thickener (sodium carboxymethylcellulose), flavouring)

pitch.4.title: description
pitch.4.text: Chocolate cake with smooth vanilla icing topped with rainbow sprinkles. Keep it simple and sweet!

pitch.4.title: ingredients
pitch.4.text: wheat flour, sugar, vanilla bean, alkalised cocoa powder, baking powder (raising agents (E 450 (diphosphates), E 500 (sodium carbonates)), starch), eggs, butter (milk, salt), salt, milk, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, sprinkles (sugar, rice flour, coconut oil, water, shea fat, fruit and vegetable concentrates [radish, apple, lemon, blackcurrant], thickener (sodium carboxymethylcellulose), flavouring)

pitch.5.title: description
pitch.5.text: Strawberry-flavoured cupcake with strawberry icing topped with seasonal cherries. Summer in every bite!

pitch.5.title: ingredients
pitch.5.text: wheat flour, sugar, vanilla bean, strawberries, cherries, baking powder (raising agents (E 450 (diphosphates), E 500 (sodium carbonates)), starch), eggs, butter (milk, salt), salt, milk
